speaker: Archmage
lines: You hesitate for a moment, the pool in the center of the room is something other worldly.
'If you are too weak then you chose the wrong path.'
He slams his staff on the ground.
'Your first lesson to power. Be prepared.
An unknown force sends you flying backwards, you hit the wall and fall to the ground.
'I should have known you would choose the wrong path.'
'Over the years I have seen many like you, weak and foolish.'
'You seem to be the most foolish of them all.'
'You will be punished for your choice.'
He raises his staff, and a beam of energy shoots out from the end of the staff, hitting you in the chest.
'This is the price of your choice.'
His laughter echoes through the room.
